name: Connectris (Bozo)
description:
A mix of two classic games from the arcade era, Asteroids, and Tetris.

Pilot your ship with WASD, aim with your cursor, and use Left and Right click on your mouse to rotate incoming Tetriminos, your ship will fire on its own.

The pierce of a bullet is dependent on the amount of tiles in a row behind it, so try to avoid gaps in your ship building!!

Feel free to post your high scores in the comments :)
